class.name: DiscordppAudioDevice
class.description:
Represents a single input or output audio device available to the user. Discord will initialize the audio engine with the system default input and output devices. You can change the device through the Client by passing the id of the desired audio device.
Reference: [url]https://discord.com/developers/docs/social-sdk/classdiscordpp_1_1AudioDevice.html[/url]

method.name: Equals
method.description: Compares the ID of two AudioDevice objects for equality.

method.name: Id
method.description: The ID of the audio device.

method.name: IsDefault
method.description: Whether the audio device is the system default device.

method.name: Name
method.description: The display name of the audio device.
